name: EPA_QUESTIONS
description: This table holds the questions for an electronic prior authorization interaction.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QUESN_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: QUESN_SEQUENCE_NUM
columns.description: The item holds the sequence number for the electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: QUESN_LEVEL
columns.description: This item holds the question level for the electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: DFLT_NEXT_QUESN
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the default next question to show after this question.

columns.name: QUESN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the type of question for electronic prior authorization.

columns.name: SEL_QUES_START_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the first select question detail line associated with this electronic prior authorization question. The actual select question details are stored in referral file (RFL) related group 9350.

columns.name: SEL_QUESN_END_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the last select question detail line associated with this electronic prior authorization question. The actual select question details are stored in referral file (RFL) related group 9350.

columns.name: DT_QUESN_REQ_TM_YN
columns.description: This item indicates if a time is required for an electronic prior authorization date question.

columns.name: NUM_CMP_START_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the first conditional comparison detail line associated with this electronic prior authorization question. The actual conditional comparison details are stored in RFL related group 9340.

columns.name: NUM_CMP_END_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the last conditional comparison detail line associated with this electronic prior authorization question. The actual conditional comparison details are stored in RFL related group 9340.

columns.name: CODE_REF_START_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the first coded reference detail line associated with this electronic prior authorization question. The actual coded reference details are stored in referral file (RFL) related group 9390.

columns.name: CODE_REF_END_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the last coded reference detail line associated with this electronic prior authorization question. The actual coded reference details are stored in referral file (RFL) related group 9390.

columns.name: SEL_QUES_MULT_YN
columns.description: This item holds whether multiple answers can be selected for selection questions.
